text: Tippecanoe is a future rail station under construction in San Bernardino, California, United States. It will be served directly by Arrow commuter rail upon the system's completion in 2022. Metrolink's San Bernardino Line trains will utilize the main track, but will not stop at this station. ==References== Category:Railway stations scheduled to open in 2022 Category:Public transportation in San Bernardino County, California Category:Future Metrolink (California) stations
title: Tippecanoe station
